div.p: New Grotesque Book, invented, engraved, and published by Christoph Jamnitzer, burgher and goldsmith in Nuremburg. An ancient antique temple full of brand new strange wares. Useful for all, whatever art you choose, driven by a new effect. Do not hope it bears no fruit. Whoever does not love it, leave it alone. Year: 1610. With grace & privilege of the Holy Imperial Majesty.
